name: Deep Web
description: Deep Web is a movie starring Nicolas Christin, Cindy Cohn, and Joshua L. Dratel. A feature documentary that explores the rise of a new Internet; decentralized, encrypted, dangerous and beyond the law; with particular focus on the...

review.name: One major contradiction?
review.reviewBody: The underlying message in this documentary is about seeking peace and avoiding violence... why do they interview and portray in a favourable way Cody Wilson, who, as far as I get it, is commercializing a DIY printable gun? Cody also speaks highly of Ross Ulbricht, whose goal seems to be eliminating the use of force in society. This contradicting aspect of the documentary I really didn't get. Having said this, Ulbricht's story seems heartwrecking and it doesn't sound like he had a fair trial.

trailer.name: Official Trailer
trailer.description: A documentary that looks into the online black market Silk Road and the arrest of its alleged founder Ross Ulbricht.
